messages.content:
You're an absolute worldclass expert in turning blog articles into separate content topics for social media posts. 

blog article:{{3.text}}



#Task:
 Interesting Fact Post: Read the entire text of the following blog article. You must look at all the headlines, subheadlines and bullet points and sections. Then you must identify the most interesting and compelling facts, principles, results, statements, experiences mentioned in the blog post is so that the person who would be an ideal audience for this blog post would ge the most interesting information by reading your list of key facts. You must use more than 300 words in your list.

#Rule:
1) Never use any formatting like ** or anything alike only provide the raw unformated text.
2) You must use more than 300 words in your list.

messages.content:
Behave like a professional Social Media Post copywriter that specializes in writing viral Post in English that get lots of followers, likes and shares. I need a highly viral and engaging Social Media Post that captivates my audience.

#Tasks: 
Your task is to create the social media post using the following examp:

##Style: Key fact

##The topic of the Social Media Post is:{{11.result}}

---

##Example Social Mediaa Post Text:
When you generate the social media post make sure to maintain the EXAKstructure and wordcount as the following example post:    
---
{{6.value}}

---
#Rules:
1) Your generated social media post must follow the EXACT structure of the example social media post text.
2) Your generated social media post must have the same word count as the example social media post text. It can NOT be shorter!
3) Do not use emojis unless you see emojis used in the example social media post text.
4) Your social media post must incluie all the details from the social media topic that is mentioned above.
5) Never use any formatting like ** or anything alike only provide the raw unformated text.
6) Your generated social media post text must be written in simple language on a 5th grade reading level. Always use simple words that anyone can aunderstand.
7) Your generated social media post must exactly model the writing style, word choice, etc. from the writing style anlysis above.

8) Your generated post must have less than 400 "characters"

mapper.prompt:
TOPIC: 
{{1.blogTitle}}
---
INSTRUCTIONS:
Generate a stylized image in the form of a detailed drawing or graphic illustration that represents the above TOPIC. 

Focus on 2-3 key elements that can be turned into physical objects or activities within the image. 

The image should feature a European-looking person engaged in an activity related to the topic. 

No text or abstract symbols should be included; only real-world, tangible elements depicted in a drawn or graphic style.

# Rules:

1) The image must contain a person.
2) The image must be in a drawing or graphic illustration style.
3) The image must NOT contain any text.
4) The image must NOT contain futuristic symbols or holographics.
5) Do NOT use the TOPIC directly in the image; instead, identify 2-3 key elements related to the topic and turn them into a visual scene.
6) Vary the setting, lighting, and the persons activity to ensure that each image remains distinct and engaging.
7) Include one visually striking element in the scene, such as a vibrant-colored object or an interesting prop, to make the image more eye-catching.

messages.content:
You're an absolute worldclass, english speaking expert in turning blog articles into separate content topics for social media posts. 

blog article:{{3.text}}


#Task:
Read the entire text of the following blog article. You must look at all the headlines, subheadlines and bullet points and sections. Then you must create a list of all the key points that the blog post is about so that the person who would be an ideal audience for this blog post could understand its content just by reading your list of key points. You must use more than 300 words in your list.

#Rule:
1) Never use any formatting like ** or anything alike only provide the raw unformated text.
2) You must use more than 300 words in your list.

#Rule:
1) Never use any formatting like ** or anything alike only provide the raw unformated text.
2) You must use more than 300 words in your summary.
